name: Totally Realistic Sledding VR
description: Totally Realistic Sledding is a fast and over-the-top sledding/skiing simulator for VR! Jump off high cliffs, slide off ramps beneath beautiful sunsets and have heart pounding close shaves with dangerous obstacles.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 (equivalent or better) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970, or AMD Radeon R9 290 (equivalent or better) Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 117 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 (equivalent or better) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 480 (equivalent or better) Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 117 MB available space
